content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 18}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 11, "index": 45}]

thought: The recipe for crafting end_rod requires 1 blaze_rod and 1 popped_chorus_fruit. I have the blaze_rod, but not the popped_chorus_fruit. However, I can smelt the chorus_fruit to get the popped_chorus_fruit. Therefore, I will smelt the chorus_fruit from slot 22 to an empty slot (eg., 12).
act: smelt from slot 22 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 18}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 11, "index": 45}]

thought: Now that I have the popped_chorus_fruit, I can craft the end_rod. The recipe requires me to place the blaze_rod above the popped_chorus_fruit. Therefore, I will move the blaze_rod from slot 11 to slot 1 (which is above slot 12).
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 18}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 11, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I just need to move the popped_chorus_fruit to the right of the blaze_rod (ie., slot 4), so that I can craft the end_rod.
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: end_rod
inventory=[{"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "popped_chorus_fruit", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 35, "index": 18}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 47, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ore", "quantity": 11, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the end_rod, I can move it to an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
